About the Company: Eros International Media Ltd is in the business of sourcing Indian and other film content and exploiting it worldwide through their offices in India, UK, USA, UAE, Singapore, Australia, the Isle of Man and Fiji across formats such as theatres, home entertainment, television and digital new media.The company sources content primarily through acquisitions from third parties and through co-productions and, occasionally, through their own productions. They mainly acquire films from third party producers at various stages of a films production for an agreed contractual value, and also co-produce films from inception with certain producers for a pre-agreed fixed budget.
